rComments: Great teacher, wants you to succeed, go to office hours, he steps you through homework problems if you have questions

He was an awesome professor. Probably the best Physics professor on this campus.  His lectures were clear and precise so there was no room for ambiguity.  I didn't really read the book but if you just go to lecture you can definitely pass the class with a B, because he teaches you everything that will be on the test.

Like everyone else is saying, he is an extremely fair and accessible professor. His lectures were clear and well-organized, meaning that I finished this class feeling very confident about the material without having to kill myself with work and studying. Plus, he has this quiet/dry humor thing going on that eased the pain of an 8 am lecture

Dr. Fang is the best Physics teacher I've ever had! He was able to make the class really interesting by relating the material to everyday life. He is very willing to answer questions and explain things multiple times. He makes himself very available to students and doesn't give too intense of a workload.

Jerome is a great teacher! I never attended lectures since it was 8am, but I made an effort to watch every webcast. Eventually, it brought me joy watching every lecture. His humor and dedication made the class worth while. As a CS major, I despised how Physics was required. I enjoyed taking 6B with Jerome though!
Great Porfessor, very straightforward, exams are very fair,no tricks, very helpful in office hours.

I used to hate physics but Jerome is one of the best teachers I've ever had! His lectures are very clear, he explains the concept and then shows an example. The homework reflected lecture notes and the exams were based off the homework and were completely fair. He is also always available to help you! TAKE PHYSICS WITH JEROME.

Taught very well, was super available, and really went out of his way to bring humor into the classroom. Went over everything he expected of us on the tests and generally open to questions. If you can, take one of his classes!
He was super clear and a great, helpful teacher. If you can do the hw and practice test problems, you should ace his tests!

Jerome is one of the best professors at UCSC. He explains the material clearly and is always willing to answer questions. He also has a great sense of humor and doesn't take himself too seriously like a lot of professors do. The homework problems are a little challenging, but the exams are very straightforward.

Best professor I have ever had at UCSC. Truly cares about his students success and making the class enjoyable for everyone involved. Learned more in his class then 90 % of other classes I have taken. Real fair with homework and exams and just truly a nice guy. I suggest taking him in any class. You rock Jerome

One of the best professors I have ever had. He would always keep the class interesting with his demos. 30% midterm and 45% non cumulative final were based right off the HW which wasn't hard. Plenty of OH's to get help if needed. I wish he taught the whole series.
Awesome teacher, take physics with him if possible.

Jerome is the best professor I've had so far in my academic career. He has a webcast for every lecture, which is helpful to those that don't like attending class. He is very concise with explanations on every topic we touched. His midterm and final were ABSOLUTELY fair. No surprises whatsoever. The midterm and final reflect what's given in the HW!
Best physics professor at UCSC! <3 his class! Made physics seem so fun and easy!  I'm so close to an A- right now about 1-2 points off. Hope he helps me out :)

Professor Fang is the best teacher I've had a class with at UCSC. Not only will you walk away having a different outlook on physics, you will also be inspired by this professor. I can't express how much this class has changed me. I got a B because I had a plot of things going on this quarter. You can definitely do better! Exams are very fair!
Didn't go to his class because it was 8AM, but he post his lecture online. SUPER HELPFUL, NO NEED FOR BOOKS. Make sure to do the homework, they're super helpful to understand what is being taught

Physics is least favorite subject but Jerome (even 4 weeks into the quarter) is already one of the best professors i've ever had. His lectures/notes are INCREDIBLY clear, and he explains everything so thoroughly. Its very easy to understand. The fact that I regularly attend, understand, and enjoy this class despite being at 8am means he's great!!
awesome guy! super interested in astronomy and super laid back. you have to go to class for the in class writing assignment but this class is so easy. I pulled off an A and ended up liking astronomy.

Jerome is a really cool dude.  Always clear in lecture, and even able to crack a joke or two. He LOVES astronomy, and it really comes through during his teaching. No need to but the book, I used it 3 times when looking for some extra clarity, but definitely not worth buying.

Jerome was a really cool guy. I learned a lot from him. Study study study the homework and TPS questions. Some of the questions on his exams are tricky so make sure you thoroughly read each and every question correctly. Overall, you won't regret taking this class. He's really cool!

Jerome was a great professor. I wasn't that interested in astronomy but his interest in it kind of rubbed off on me and made what would have been an otherwise boring class extremely bearable. He posts his lectures online (in video format) which really comes in handy for studying. I wouldn't mind taking this class again.

Jerome is a wonderful professor! He is funny and extremely easygoing. It's apparent that he cares a lot about his students. The class is incredibly interesting and the tests are alright as long as you study a bit. Overall, astronomy 1 with Jerome was a wonderful experience--especially for my first quarter of college!

He is such an amazing professor & he is funny, his lectures are really good and he is really helpful. 2 midterms, 1 cumulative final, 6 online hw assignments and In class writing assignments very upfront and easy, test are a bit difficult but he provides you with a study guide and great advice if you have a chance take this class you wont regret it
Jerome was funny and super clear about his expectations. Definitely an easy yet interesting GE

Attendance is mandatory for in-class writings which is part of your grade, but very straight forward. Homework is straight forward as well. If you didn't do well on the midterm he will surely will help you during office hours! No textbook needed & the midterms and finals are all multiple choice. I highly recommend this class for a GE.

Great professor! The class was pretty easy and interesting. All of the tests were multiple choice and weren't too bad if you went to class and studied a little. Would definitely recommend taking it for a GE.

This class was extremely interesting and very well taught. The professor makes it clear what is expected from you and everything you need to know for the tests and homeworks are in his lecture slides, which are all available online.
easy class
Clear and easy GE course, homework and tests are multiple choice and fairly simple. Homework is online and completed easily. Fang has a good presence and can keep a class's attention.

Great interest for topics. Ability to make complex topics clear made the class enjoyable. Lectures were always interesting, overall great learning experience. I was a senior just taking this class for general interest, well worth it.
Fantastic teacher! Really smart and funny and approachable. He made intro to astronomy fun and easy. would definitely recommend!

Best, amazing class! Loved it! Class is very interesting, not hard, everything is comprehensible. Midterms multiple choice, FINAL multiple choice as well. STUDY and  you'll do great! book is not necessary. Take this class its awesome! easy!
Great professor, class is interesting, hw is easy, multiple choice midterm and final! STUDY and you'll be fine! Book is not really necessary!

Jerome is an excellent professor. Given its a GE class he actually makes it interesting by not simply reading off the slides but actually explaining them. Hws are easy, midterms are perdy easy if you study(not even a whole lot)&I personally enjoyed attending class. For a GE or just to balance out workload you definitely should take this class.
